amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to eliminating tax breaks for companies that ship jobs to foreign countries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1234 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1234 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Donnelly to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6615-6616, S6620; text: CR S6616) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to eliminating tax breaks for companies that ship jobs to foreign countries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1234 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1234 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Donnelly to Amendment SA 1116.
